diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+/* Copyright 2016 The TensorFlow Authors. All Rights Reserved.

+WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+limitations under the License.
+==============================================================================*/
+
+#include "tensorflow/core/framework/common_shape_fns.h"
+#include "tensorflow/core/framework/op.h"
+#include "tensorflow/core/framework/shape_inference.h"
+
+namespace tensorflow {
+
+// --------------------------------------------------------------------------
+REGISTER_OP("Roll")
+    .Input("input: T")
+    .Input("shift: Tshift")
+    .Input("axis: Taxis")
+    .Output("output: T")
+    .Attr("T: type")
+    .Attr("Tshift: {int32,int64}")
+    .Attr("Taxis: {int32,int64}")
+    .SetShapeFn(shape_inference::UnchangedShape)
+    .Doc(R"doc(
+Rolls the elements of a tensor by the offsets of `shift` along the dimensions
body: @asimshankar I ended up removing the .Doc line because I noticed that it wasn't being used for other ops like in `array_ops.cc`. The summary and description is defined in `tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/api_def_Roll.pbtxt` and has the changes you've suggested.
body_html: @asimshankar I ended up removing the .Doc line because I noticed that it wasn't being used for other ops like in array_ops.cc. The summary and description is defined in tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/api_def_Roll.pbtxt and has the changes you've suggested.
body_text: @asimshankar I ended up removing the .Doc line because I noticed that it wasn't being used for other ops like in array_ops.cc. The summary and description is defined in tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/api_def_Roll.pbtxt and has the changes you've suggested.
